Cypher.Name: Density Nodule
Cypher.Effect: For the next 28 hours, each time the weapon the nodule is attached to strikes a solid creature or object, the weapon suddenly increases dramatically in weight, causing the blow to inflict an additional 2 points of damage (3 points if the cypher is level 4 or higher).
Cypher.Usable: Crystal nodule affixed to a melee weapon
